user_query: I'm planning a trip to the Maldives with my family and we want to know the current Fear & Greed index value to make informed financial decisions. Also, can you provide us with the merchant rewards available for our credit cards in the Maldives? We're particularly interested in the rewards offered by Singapore Airlines.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current Fear & Greed index value to understand market sentiment.
Search for merchant rewards associated with credit cards in the Maldives, specifically those offered by Singapore Airlines.
